fn.p: Edited by: Marcelo Arruda Nakazone, Faculty of Medicine of São José do Rio Preto, Brazil
Reviewed by: Andrea Kurz, Cleveland Foundation, United States; Bruno Caramelli, University of São Paulo, Brazil
